title: csdata
text: Valid locations (location types) available csdata::nor_locations_names(). Uncommon/internal use demarcated line text.

title: csdata
text: Ages coded characters always contain 3 digits. age range, two ages joined underscore (e.g. 005_010). Use 085p instead >=085 85+, allow easy conversion long wide formatted data. format help data easily sorted, kept right order, generate valid variable names converted wide-format. Missing ages coded “missing”.

title: csdata
text: Sex coded characters. Missing sexes coded “missing”.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Richard Aubrey White. Author, maintainer. Chi Zhang. Author. . Copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: White RA, Zhang C (2024). csdata: Structural Data Norway. R package version 2024.9.26, https://github.com/csids/csdata, https://www.csids./csdata/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {csdata: Structural Data for Norway},   author = {Richard Aubrey White and Chi Zhang},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 2024.9.26, https://github.com/csids/csdata},   url = {https://www.csids.no/csdata/}, }

title: Structural Data for Norway
text: csdata contains preformatted structural data Norway. Datasets relating population municipalities, municipality/county matching, different municipalities merged/redistricted time 2006 2024. Read introduction vignette run help(package="csdata").

title: Structural Data for Norway
text: csverse set R packages developed help solve problems frequently occur performing disease surveillance. want install dev versions (access packages haven’t released CRAN), run usethis::edit_r_profile() edit .Rprofile. write : Save file restart R. can now install csverse packages drat repository.
code: options(   repos = structure(c(     CSVERSE = "https://www.csids.no/drat/",     CRAN    = "https://cran.rstudio.com"   )) ) install.packages("csdata")

what: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set — add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
title: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set — add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
text: Adds granularity_geo given data set

title: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set — add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
Adds granularity_geo to a given data set — add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
text: x data.table containing column called "location_code". location_reference location reference data.table.

title: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set — add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
text: data.table containing extra column called "granularity_geo".

title: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set — add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
code: library(data.table) data <- data.table(location_code = c("norge", "county03", "blah")) csdata::add_granularity_geo_to_data_set(data) print(data) #>    location_code granularity_geo #>           <char>          <char> #> 1:         norge          nation #> 2:      county03          county #> 3:          blah            blah  library(data.table) data <- data.table(location_code = c("norge", "county03", "blah")) csdata::add_granularity_geo_to_data_set(data, location_reference = csdata::nor_locations_names()) print(data) #>    location_code granularity_geo #>           <char>          <char> #> 1:         norge            <NA> #> 2:      county03            <NA> #> 3:          blah            <NA>

title: Adds iso3 to a given data set — add_iso3_to_data_set
code: library(data.table) data <- data.table(location_code = c("norge", "county03", "blah")) csdata::add_iso3_to_data_set(data) print(data) #>    location_code granularity_geo #>           <char>          <char> #> 1:         norge             nor #> 2:      county03             nor #> 3:          blah             nor

what: An environment containing configuration variables — config
title: An environment containing configuration variables — config
text: Available configuration variables: border_nor (default 2024): year Norwegian geographical boundaries designated. Valid values: 2020, 2024.

title: An environment containing configuration variables — config
An environment containing configuration variables — config
text: object class environment length 1.

title: An environment containing configuration variables — config
code: print(ls(csdata::config)) #> [1] "border_nor" for(i in names(csdata::config)){   cat(i, ":", csdata::config[[i]], "\n") } #> border_nor : 2024

title: Location hierarchies in Norway — nor_locations_hierarchy_from_to
text: Calculates relationship different locations Norway, according geographic granularity. example, municipalities inside counties.

title: Location hierarchies in Norway — nor_locations_hierarchy_from_to
code: nor_locations_hierarchy_from_to(   from,   to,   include_to_name = FALSE,   border = csdata::config$border_nor )

title: Location hierarchies in Norway — nor_locations_hierarchy_from_to
text: wardoslo, wardbergen, wardtrondheim, wardstavanger, municip, baregion, county, georegion, mtregion, notmainlandmunicip, notmainlandcounty, missingmunicip, missingcounty wardoslo, wardbergen, wardtrondheim, wardstavanger, municip, baregion, county, georegion, mtregion, notmainlandmunicip, notmainlandcounty, missingmunicip, missingcounty include_to_name want include name '' location? border year Norwegian geographical boundaries designated (2020, 2024).

title: All names in Norway — nor_locations_names
text: border year Norwegian geographical boundaries designated (2020, 2024).

title: All names in Norway — nor_locations_names
text: location_code Location code. location_name Location name. location_name_short 3 letter location name nation county. shorter location name wardoslo extrawardoslo. location_name_description_nb Location name additional description. location_name_file_nb_utf Location name used file names, Norwegian characters. location_name_file_nb_ascii Location name used file names, without Norwegian characters. location_order preferred presentation order. granularity_geo nation, county, municip, wardoslo, wardbergen, wardstavanger, wardtrondheim, baregion, lab.

title: All redistricting in Norway — nor_locations_redistricting
text: function returns dataset used transfer "original" datasets 2020 2024 borders.

title: All redistricting in Norway — nor_locations_redistricting
text: border year Norwegian geographical boundaries designated (2020, 2024).

title: All redistricting in Norway — nor_locations_redistricting
text: location_code_current location code per today. location_code_original location code "calyear". calyear year corresponding "county_code_original". weighting weighting needs applied. granularity_geo nation, county, municip, wardbergen, wardoslo, wardstavanger, wardtrondheim, missingwardbergen, missingwardoslo, missingwardstavanger, missingwardtrondheim, notmainlandcounty, notmainlandmunicip, missingcounty

what: Population in Norway by categories — nor_population_by_age_cats
title: Population in Norway by categories — nor_population_by_age_cats
text: function easily categorizes Norwegian population different age categories.

title: Population in Norway by categories — nor_population_by_age_cats
code: nor_population_by_age_cats(   cats = NULL,   include_total = TRUE,   include_9999 = FALSE,   border = csdata::config$border_nor )

title: Population in Norway by categories — nor_population_by_age_cats
text: cats list containing vectors want categorize. include_total Boolean. 'total' included age cat? include_9999 Boolean. current year duplicated added "calyear==9999". accordance cstidy principles regarding granularity_time=="event_*". border year Norwegian geographical boundaries designated (2020, 2024).

title: Population in Norway by categories — nor_population_by_age_cats
text: data.table containing following columns: granularity_geo location_code age (specified argument "cats") sex ("total") calyear pop_jan1_n imputed
